confirm_subscription.subject: Confirm your subscription
confirm_subscription.body:
Hi {{username}},

Thanks for joining us! Please confirm your subscription by clicking the link below:
{{confirm_url}}

Welcome aboard!
delivery_confirmation.subject: How did we do?
delivery_confirmation.body:
Hi {{username}},

Your package from order {{order_id}} has been delivered! We'd love to hear your feedback.
Please take a moment to fill out our short survey:
{{survey_url}}

Thanks for choosing us!
gift_claim.subject: You've received a gift!
gift_claim_reminder.subject: Claim your 3D Print
gift_claim_reminder.body: Your gift is waiting! Click {{ link }} to claim it and customize your print.
gift_printing.subject: Your gift is printing
gift_printing.body: Good news! Your gift print is now being produced. We'll notify you once it's on the way.
gift_upsell.subject: Send a gift back
gift_upsell.body: We hope you loved your recent gift print! Did you know you can send a custom print back to the giver? Check out our models and surprise them.
lease_renewal.subject: Lease Renewal Reminder
lease_renewal.body:
Your lease is nearing its end on {{end_date}}.
Please review renewal options.
order_delay.subject: Order Update
order_delay.body: Hi {{username}},\n\nYour order {{order_id}} is taking longer than expected. We're sorry for the delay and will ship it as soon as possible.
password_reset.subject: Password Reset
password_reset.body:
Hi {{username}},

Someone requested a password reset for your account. If this was you, please reset your password using the link below:
{{reset_url}}

If you didn't request this, feel free to ignore this email.
post_purchase_followup.subject: Thanks for your order
post_purchase_followup.body:
Hi {{username}},

We hope you're enjoying your recent print. If you'd like another copy or want to share the experience with a friend, you can easily reorder below:

{{reorder_url}}

Thanks for supporting our community!
purchase_reminder.subject: Complete your purchase
purchase_reminder.body:
Hi {{username}},

We noticed you haven't finished your purchase yet. If you'd like to complete it, just return to your jobs page and finalize the order.

Let us know if you need any help!
discount_offer.subject: Complete your purchase
reminder.subject: print2 pro Reminder
reminder.body:
Hi {{username}},

You still have unused print2 pro credits this month. Be sure to redeem your prints before they reset!

Thanks for being a member.
rental_agreement.subject: Rental Agreement
shipping_confirmation.subject: Your order has shipped
shipping_confirmation.body:
Hi {{username}},

Your order {{order_id}} has shipped! You can track its progress here:
{{tracking_url}}

Thanks for supporting our community!
shipping_update.subject: Package update: {{status}}
addon_upsell.subject: Enhance your print
addon_upsell.body: Thanks for your recent order! Want to enhance your print with accessories? Use code {{code}} for $5 off any add-on.
